content: {"name": "Riverdale Neighborhood House Monthly Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Pantry items and limited produce available. No eligibility requirements. Register here for your first visit: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeR8-KRjuPO8o0c-Lj8qIIUvaV9L6GBDt7Ix275ubyu1BND5g/viewform", "email": "", "url": "https://www.riverdaleonline.org/food-and-farm", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5521 Mosholu Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "North Riverdale", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10471", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9033612, "longitude": -73.9038554}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 549-8100", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Indoors or outdoors depending on weather. If indoors, there will be signs directing people to the gym which has elevator access."}]}
